reviews.review_msg: Great guy. You can tell he's passionate about the course. He is very kind and very easy to reach out to. It felt like he guided me through the course even tho I reached out maybe 2-3 times. His feedback is very detailed and insightful. He's just a great prof.

Shane is an amazing and passionate prof that enlightened me so much regarding communications role in climate change. You can tell he cares about the topic so much and wanted us to be engaged and make the course as interesting as possible. He is clear, organized and informative. TA's a tough marker so make sure to prepare for the papers.
She was nice and could tell she was really passionate when she taught
